1.1.0.name: wordpress/ls-icecast-onair
1.1.0.description:
Simple WordPress plugin to display onair song fetched from IceCast server (v2). You just need to setup icecast server address and publish point name (via admin panel). Data are fetched using CRON. Insert using shortcode to any post or directly to template using do_shortcode();

Usage example

[icecast live=0]

Parameters

live: 0 - simple text 1 - live update via JavaScript

NOTE

You need to update your IceCast web folder with "xml.xsl" file (included with plugin). See Installation for more information...
